schema.name: Healthyfied White Christmas Salad

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the radish, tomatoes, red bell pepper, and red onion under cold water.
Dice the radish, tomatoes, red bell pepper, and slice the red onion thinly.
In a large salad bowl, combine the diced radish, tomatoes, red bell pepper, and sliced onion.
Season the salad with salt and pepper, then toss well to ensure the vegetables are evenly coated.

schema.description: This Healthyfied White Christmas Salad is a festive treat for anyone looking to enjoy the holidays while keeping it low-carb but not compromising on flavor. With a high-sodium profile, it’s perfect for those who are keeping an eye on their carb intake but love a flavorful salad. This salad combines the crispiness of radishes with the sweetness of tomatoes and the sharp tang of red onion, all seasoned to perfection. It’s a celebration of healthy recipes that don’t skimp on taste!
